The Health & Environment Committee will meet to discuss the Net Zero Action Plan FY20
progress report and to receive a general update on the plan including the upcoming 5-year review
process.
A presentation was received from Seth Federspiel, Net Zero Energy Planner, for the Health and
Environment Committee meeting on August 11, 2020.
